snippet.title: Tomba! Special Edition - Official Release Date Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Tomba! Special Edition is an enhanced version of the legendary platformer developed by Limited Run Games. Players will explore ancient relics, discover fascinating characters, unlock thrilling quests, and unearth hidden treasures just as they did in 1997 but now with quality-of-life improvements for the modern era. Tomba! Special Edition is launching on August 1 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).
